mapper.select: select boardNo, parentsBoardNo, B.memNo, boardDepth, boardLevelNo, boardTitle, boardContext, boardRegisterDateTime, boardModifyDateTime, boardCommentCount, boardViewCount, boardDeleteCheck, M.memId from board B inner join mem M on B.memNo = M.memNo
mapper.insert: insert into board(boardNo, parentsBoardNo, memNo, boardDepth, boardLevelNo, boardTitle, boardContext, boardRegisterDateTime, boardModifyDateTime, boardCommentCount, boardViewCount, boardDeleteCheck) values (#{boardNo}, #{parentsBoardNo}, #{memNo}, #{boardDepth}, #{boardLevelNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContext}, #{boardRegisterDateTime}, #{boardModifyDateTime}, #{boardCommentCount}, #{boardViewCount}, #{boardDeleteCheck})
mapper.update: update board set boardContext= #{boardContext}, boardTitle = #{boardTitle} where memNo = #{memNo} and boardRegisterDateTime = #{boardRegisterDateTime} and boardTitle = #{boardTitle}
mapper.select: select M.memId from board B inner join mem M on B.memNo = M.memNo where B.boardNo = ${boardNo}
